UnitDefinition.Name: Effect metric
UnitDefinition.Description: Accepted types of effect metrics. Controlled terminology.

Unit.Name: Relative risk
Unit.Description: Use relative risk when the risk is expressed as a relative risk.

Unit.Name: Odds ratio
Unit.Description: Use odds ratio when the risk is expressed as an odds ratio.

Unit.Name: Negative shift
Unit.Description: Use negative shift when the risk is expressed as a negative shift in a continuous variable.

Unit.Name: Positive shift
Unit.Description: Use positive shift when the risk is expressed as a positive shift in a continuous variable.
